name: Oops You Started An Intergalactic War
name_original: Oops You Started An Intergalactic War
description:
Github Repo here (downloads generated from workflow)

Art assets created using my Playdate art tool.

A silent game, because space or something.

WASD + Mouse Clicks + Mouse Scroll to replicate Playdate D-Pad, A / B, Crank.

You play an intergalactic diplomat trying to follow an Etiquette Guide and not embarrass a party of aliens in the 45 seconds given to you.

There's an Easy,  Medium, and Hard mode where the number of randomly generated Etiquette Rules & the score drain per second varies. 

As you can tell from the repo's commit log it didn't actually have win / lose states until not that long ago so... yeah.

There's a few things which would (probably) need optimised to run on an actual device.
